spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout mismatch between 2D and 3D. (E1/E2) Dining Room is missing entirely; its footprint is replaced by an open area labeled "KANTRY" and oversized "POWDER ROOM". (E2/E4) Kitchen + pantry arrangement does not match: pantry in 2D is a small enclosed room off the kitchen; in 3D it is an open central zone with an island/cabinets. (E2/E3) Door locations/orientations are inconsistent: the 2D shows a door swing between Dining and Kitchen area and a defined WC door; 3D does not reflect these placements. (E2) Window locations/types differ: 2D has multiple smaller windows distributed on exterior walls; 3D uses large floor-to-ceiling glazing and places openings that do not correspond to the plan. (E4) Room proportions are notably distorted (e.g., "Powder Room" area is far larger than any powder/WC zone in the 2D).

structural_fidelity.notes: Structural relationships deviate heavily. (E1) Missing Dining Room. (E1) Missing the small WC enclosure as drawn (2D shows a compact WC near foyer/closet zone; 3D does not represent it as a small separate room). (E5) Hallucinated large "POWDER ROOM" occupying a major portion of the plan that should be Living/Dining circulation. (E2) Stairs are represented differently: 2D shows an open stair/landing configuration central-top; 3D encloses/frames stairs with walls creating a different core and circulation. (E2) Adjacencies are wrong: in 2D, Living–Dining–Kitchen have a clear sequence; in 3D the central area is reorganized such that Dining is not between Living and Kitchen and pantry is not a discrete adjacent room.

furniture_mapping.notes: (E2) Kitchen fixtures/counters are not mapped to the 2D layout (2D indicates specific counter runs and sink placements; 3D places multiple islands/blocks that don't correspond). (E4) Furniture/fixture scale is inconsistent with the 2D (oversized island blocks and oversized labeled "Powder Room" area relative to plan). Minimal other furniture exists to verify accurately.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric presentation is clear and visually clean. Camera angle reads as isometric-like and composition is good. Lighting is consistent and geometry is mostly clean. Minor issues: glazing style/scale looks exaggerated compared to typical plan windows (a design choice but reduces plan-to-render fidelity), and some wall/trim thickness reads inconsistent at corners.

detected_errors.description: Dining Room from the 2D plan is missing in the 3D render.
A large room labeled "POWDER ROOM" is hallucinated; the 2D plan only indicates a small WC/powder area near the foyer, not a large room.
Pantry is misplaced/redefined: 2D shows a small enclosed pantry off the kitchen; 3D shows an open central "KANTRY" zone with island/cabinets.
Stair core/circulation is structurally different: 2D open stair/landing configuration is not preserved in 3D (enclosure/wall framing changes).
Door placement/orientation does not match the 2D plan (notably the WC door and the Dining–Kitchen connection with a shown door swing in 2D).
Window placement and window type/size do not match: 2D distributed smaller windows; 3D uses large floor-to-ceiling glazing and positions openings inconsistently.
Significant proportion distortion: central/left areas are reallocated, producing room sizes and footprints that diverge from the 2D plan.
